name: The Legend of Zelda: Mercuris' Chest
storyline: Link was quietly taking a nap in his house, when suddenly two strangers kidnapped him and brought him to an unknown kingdom. When he finally woke up, a priest explained that they need Link’s help to fight against a giant bird who tries to steal a legendary chest, containing a dangerous weapon. What is in this chest? Who is that mysterious bird warrior? And why this kingdom seems so familiar, but also so different? Our hero will live a whole new journey in a huge world full of mysteries, traveiling and side quests.
summary: In this independent fangame from the Solarus Team, Link is brought to a mysterious kingdom where his help is needed to fight a giant bird who tries to steal a dangerous chest. Who is that mysterious bird warrior? Why does this place seem so familiar, but also so different? Enjoy a whole new journey in a huge kingdom full of mysteries, travelling and side quests.
